title: Televisión Española
author: Pidjohto

comments.content: Thanks for the new samples. I was wrong. It's not Meta FF. It's RTVE corporate font called 'RTVE' and based on [Officina ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-sans/) (also designed by Erik Spiekermann) according to the design agency [oedesign which was in charge of the design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051021/http:/www.oedesign.info/portfolio/rtve).

Thanks for the new samples. I was wrong. It's not Meta FF. It's RTVE corporate font called 'RTVE' and based on [Officina ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/officina-sans/) (also designed by Erik Spiekermann) according to the design agency [oedesign which was in charge of the design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317051021/http:/www.oedesign.info/portfolio/rtve).
